title: Non-perturbative evolution equations for the tricritical theory
abstract: The N component scalar tricritical theory is considered in a non-perturbative setting. We derive non-perturbative beta functions for the relevant couplings in $d\leq 3$. The beta functions are obtained through the use of an exact evolution equation for the so called effective average action. In d=3 it is established the existence of an ultraviolet stable fixed point for N>4. This confirms earlier results obtained using the 1/N expansion where such a fixed point is believed to exist at least for $N\gtrsim 1000$.
